mapper.insert: { call qna_write(#{qnaDTO.writer, mode=IN},#{qnaDTO.title, mode=IN},#{qnaDTO.contents, mode=IN},#{result, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=INTEGER}) }
mapper.update: { call qna_update(#{num, mode=IN},#{title, mode=IN},#{contents, mode=IN},#{result, mode=OUT, javaType=int, jdbcType=INTEGER}) }
